columns.name: _tareWeight
columns.description: Tare weight of the empty ULD

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _externalReferences
columns.description: References to all associated ExternalReferences

columns.name: _attachedIotDevices
columns.description: References to all connected IotDevices

columns.name: _demurrageCode
columns.description: Contains three designator of demurrage code; refer to RP 1654 (BCC; HHH; XXX; ZZZ)

columns.name: _loadingIndicator
columns.description: ULD height or loading limitation code. Refer CXML Code List 1.47;  e.g. R - ULD Height above 244 centimetres

columns.name: _odlnCode
columns.description: Contains two designator codes of ODLN or Operational Damage Limit Notices. ODLN code is used to define type of damage after visually check the serviceability of ULDs section 7; Standard Specifications 4/3 or 4/4 in ULD Regulations

columns.name: _ownerCode
columns.description: Owner code of the ULD in aa; an or na format - owner can be an airline or leasing company

columns.name: _serviceabilityCode
columns.description: Designator of serviceablity condition e.g. SER or DAM

columns.name: _uldTypeCode
columns.description: Standard Unit Load Device type code e.g. AKE - Certified Container - Contoured. Refer to IATA ULD Technical Manual

columns.name: _remarks
columns.description: Remarks or Supplement Information

columns.name: _events
columns.description: Events object

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object

columns.name: _involvedInActions
columns.description: References to the Actions the object is involved in

columns.name: _ataDesignator
columns.description: US / ATA Unit Load Device type code e.g. M2

columns.name: _damageFlag
columns.description: Indicates if the ULD is Damaged

columns.name: _numberOfDoors
columns.description: Number of doors

columns.name: _numberOfFittings
columns.description: Number of fittings

columns.name: _numberOfNets
columns.description: Number of nets

columns.name: _numberOfStraps
columns.description: Number of straps

columns.name: _sealNumber
columns.description: ULD seal number if applicable

columns.name: _uldSerialNumber
columns.description: Serial number that allows to uniquely identify the ULD
